    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S250_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S250_1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Gene manipulation in plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genhandhabung in den Betrieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Manipulation de gène aux usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Manipulação do gene nas plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manipolazione del gene in piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χειρισμός γονιδίων στις εγκαταστάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Manipulación del gene en plantas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Genetic manipulation of crops is an issue of great current interest and controversy. This unit covers some of the basic science that underpins the debate and examines the hotly contested case study of the development of ‘Golden Rice’. By looking at the science 'behind the headlines' you will acquire a clearer idea of both what is possible in GM science and what may be desirable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ethics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Genetic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Gene_transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">GM</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Herbicides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Insecticides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Plasmids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Transgenic_crops</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Vitamin_A</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetische Handhabung der Getreide ist eine 
Ausgabe des großen aktuellen Interesses und der Kontroverse. 
Diese Maßeinheit umfaßt etwas von der grundlegenden 
Wissenschaft, dessen die Debatte untermauert und die heiß 
gewetteiferte Fallstudie Entwicklung?Golden Reis? überprüft. 
Indem Sie die Wissenschaft ' hinter der betrachten, erwerben Sie
Schlagzeilen eine freiere Idee von, was in der GR. Wissenschaft 
möglich ist und was wünschenswert sein kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La manipulation génétique des collectes est une 
issue de grands intérêt et polémique actuels. Cette unité 
couvre une partie de la science de base soutient la discussion et 
examine l'étude de cas avec chaleur contestée dont du développement
?Golden le riz ?. En regardant la science 'derrière vous des 
titres saisirez une idée plus claire de ce qui est possible en 
science de GM et ce qui peut être souhaitable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A manipulação genetic das colheitas é uma 
introdução do interesse e da controvérsia atuais grandes. 
Esta unidade cobre alguma da ciência básica de que underpins o
debate e examina o estudo de caso quente contestado do 
desenvolvimento?Golden o arroz?. Olhando a ciência ' atrás 
você do dos headlines' adquirirá uma idéia mais desobstruída de o 
que são possível na ciência do GM e o que pode ser desejável.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La manipolazione genetica dei raccolti è 
un'emissione di interesse e di polemica correnti grandi. Questa 
unità copre alcuna della scienza di base di che sostiene il dibattito
ed esamina l'inchiesta caldo contestata dello sviluppo?Golden il 
riso?. Guardando la scienza 'dietro dei titoli acquisterete 
un'idea più libera di sia che cosa è possibile nella scienza di GM 
che che cosa può essere desiderabile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο γενετικός χειρισμός των συγκομιδών είναι ένα 
ζήτημα του μεγάλων παρουσών ενδιαφέροντος και της διαμάχης. 
Αυτή η μονάδα καλύπτει μερικών από τη βασική επιστήμη που
υποστηρίζει τη συζήτηση και εξετάζει τη hotly αμφισβητημένη 
περιπτωσιολογική μελέτη της ανάπτυξης του ρυζιού ?Golden;. 
Με την εξέταση την επιστήμη "πίσω από τους τίτλουσ" θα 
αποκτήσετε μια σαφέστερη ιδέα και τι είναι δυνατός στην επιστήμη
της GM και τι μπορεί να είναι επιθυμητός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La manipulación genética de cosechas es una 
aplicación el grandes interés y controversia actuales. Esta 
unidad cubre algo de la ciencia básica de la cual sostiene el 
discusión y examina el estudio de caso caliente disputado del 
desarrollo?Golden el arroz?. Mirando la ciencia ' detrás usted 
del de los títulos adquirirá una idea más clara de cuál es posible
en ciencia del GM y qué puede ser deseable.</string>
          </description>
